content.html: I despise the new design trend for short form videos where you can't adjust the time to where you want to see for the video. The only option is to pause and resume. Whoever came up with that pattern, your mom's a hoe
content.value:
I despise the new design trend for short form videos where you can't adjust the time to where you want to see for the video.

The only option is to pause and resume. Whoever came up with that pattern, your mom's a hoe
